title: Blue fin (Captioned)
creator_credit: Carl Schultz, Hal McElroy and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: Pascoe expects too much from his son Snook, who always seems to be in trouble. Disaster strikes Blue Fin at sea and young Snook is the only one who can save them. The boat is wrecked and sinking. Pascoe lies injured and the crew swept overboard. Blue Fin is a heart warming story of youth growing to maturity and of human relationships.
